content.rendered: Trishna joined Regent in 2020 and is based within Regent’s Marketing Team. Trishna has a strong passion for the Marketing Industry, with PR, Social Media and Content Creation at the forefront. Upon starting at Regent, she was tasked with creating content for the new Regent College London Website as well as ensuring the content was written to a high standard and in line with the current tone of voice and writing style. In addition to other tasks, she focuses on Content Creation across all aspects of Social Media, Email Marketing, Website Content and creation of the Marketing Calendar.
